subject: Re: Message for Frank S.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well, just the pardon part, I'm still waiting for it. I was gettign an 
uncle a while back. Raymond I think it was(?)

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> Hey Frank--I hear the word "purple" quite clearly three times this  
> morning, as well as "Frank's Uncle," and "This is for Frank." I also  
> heard the word "Pardon" twice, but I'm not sure if this was 
connected  
> to the Frank's Uncle part. Does this make any sense to you?
> 
> Ann
>
